CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(RW_Welcome_Call_Status__c) == 'Reinitiate', TODAY() - RW_Welcome_Call_Reinitiate_date__c, IF(TEXT(RW_Welcome_Call_Status__c) == 'Reject', TODAY() - RW_Welcome_Call_Rejected_date__c, IF(TEXT(RW_Welcome_Call_Status__c) == 'Hold', TODAY() - RW_Welcome_Call_Hold_date__c, IF(TEXT(RW_Welcome_Call_Status__c) == 'Due', Now() - CreatedDate , 0) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Welcome Call Pending
